name: Draitron Meteornis=QUA
text: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Meteornis Draitron". Your opponent cannot target this card with Spell/Trap Cards or effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Draitron MeteornisQUA" once per turn. During your Main Phase, if this card was Ritual Summoned using monsters whose total Levels equal 2 or less: You can destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls. If this Ritual Summoned card is destroyed: You can Special Summon any number of "Draitron" monsters from your GY whose total ATK equal 4000, except "Draitron MeteornisQUA".
